children.content: Suresh Jagannathan:
Samuel D. Conte Professor
Department of Computer Science       305 North University Street       West Lafayette, IN 47907       Purdue UniversityPhone: 765-494-0971       email: suresh@cs.purdue.edu
Research Interests:
Programming Languages - Design, Implementation, and Analysis
concurrent and distributed programming
functional programming
program verification
program analysis
type systems
machine learning and programming languages
memory models
verifying compilation
Teaching:
Spring 2020: Programming Languages (graduate)
Selected Publications:
Projects:
Recent Professional Service:
ACM SIGPLAN Conference on Programming Language Design and Implementation (PLDI), 2019 PC member
46th ACM SIGPLAN Symposium on Principles of Programming Languages (POPL), 2019 PC member
5th ACM SIGPLAN International Workshop on Libraries, Languages and Compilers for Array Programming, 2018 PC member
European Symposium on Programming, 2018 PC member
ACM Conference on Programming Language Design and Implementation, 2017 External Program Committee
Support:
Students and Post-Doctoral Researchers:

Xuankang Lin   Kia Rahmani   Zhe Zhou   Zikang Xiong   Joseph Eappen   Prasita Mukherjee   Nitin Raj   Yi Xu   Wenxian Zhang   Ashish Mishra (post-doc)   Gowtham Kaki (post-doc)

Sivaramakrishnan, 2014 (IIT Madras)   Dasarath Weeratunge, 2012 (Intel)   Lukasz Ziarek, 2011 (SUNY Buffalo)   Armand Navabi, 2011 (Google)   Nicholas Kidd (post-doc), 2010 (Google)   Muralikrishna Ramanathan, 2008 (Uber)   Deepak Rao Bobbarjung, 2007 (VMWare)   Ronaldo Ferreria, 2006 (Universidade Federal de Mato Grosso Do Sul, Brazil)   Adam Welc, 2006 (Uber)
